PERSONAL DETAILS
Location:		United Arab Emirates – Dubai
QUALIFICATIONS

Managing Individual Performance, MIP for Employees
Stepping into the Leadership
Languages
English, Russian, Azeri and Turkish
CAREER SUMMARY
2014 to date DNV
2019 to date
Position: Senior Regional People Advisor and Lead of Nationalization
Previous roles with DNV:
HR Manager Middle East 2014-1017
HR Manager Middle East and Sub-Sahara 2017-2019
Business Partnering and Strategic HR Advisory:
Strategic stakeholder management and Advisory to the Business Areas –, Energy Systems, Oil&Gas, Maritime services, Business Assurance and Digital Solutions
Engaging Senior Management by providing expert advice, coaching and support on full range of HR activities (including policies and procedures, terms and conditions of employment, restructuring of services, performance management, redundancy planning.
Establishes effective resourcing, mobility, development, succession and retention plans for leadership teams / key roles across, Influence talent, performance and mobility decisions
In consultation with the HQ the implementation and roll out of standardized services as per Service Level Agreements
Oversees cultural transformation, organization design and change management post-merger and support business in enhancement of employee engagement, implementation of diversity initiatives, and ensure culture of ethical behaviour at an individual and collective level.
Review and implementation of HR Policies, OPs and procedures for Middle East and North Africa
Talent Acquisition, Management of Assessment centers and Employer Branding:
Manpower planning and Strategic alignment with the BAs
Managing talent acquisition activities and campaigns for IMEA within agreed KPIs
Driving Graduate recruitment programs in collaboration with the top universities in the Region
Using various reporting tools, such as Power Bi, Glassdoor analytics, iCIMS dashboard and reporting to forecast, analyse and adopt appropriate set of actions to increase brand visibility and Diversity & Inclusion.
Successful management of assessment centers in India and the ME, Cut-e certified, psychometric test administration and feedback session
Active headhunting of the passive talent via social platforms and other networking events
Global Mobility and International Assignment management:
Overlooking international Long-term, short-term, rotation and training assignments
Mobilization and repatriation of Assignees in the region
Grievance Management:
Consult Line Managers and employees with disciplinary and grievance cases in line with established legislations
Manage investigations and effectively handle disciplinary and grievance matters
Facilitate an optimum viable solution to support the business
Nationalization/Emiratisation:
Responsible for establishing policies and procedures for attraction, retention and development of the Nationals, Employer branding activities for Nationals
Team Management:
Effective team management and development of Public relations Officers (x3) and Nationals (x3) through open and transparent communication
Performance Management/Compensation & Benefits:
Monitor and review performance appraisals ensuring that annual appraisals are carried out in a timely basis
Working closely with HayGroup and Mercer for salary benchmarking, responsible for salary review exercise and benchmarking
Coordinating annual salary adjustment and promotion exercise, annual performance assessments
Other activities:
Project coordina

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
